content: Hello, I want to perform a query to fetch some ServiceRequest and I would like to include the insurance. The problem is there is no search parameter for insurance and I would like to make this query without making a second request to the server. insurance was excluded from the search parameters for some particular reason? thanks

insurance was added fairly recently and I expect no one had thought about searching on it. Feel free to submit a change request proposing the addition. In the meantime, you can define a custom SearchParameter
